channel.title: 602 help (client says exception in main error)
channel.description:
This is the error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: loader Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(unknown source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: loader. Program will exit
Does anybody know how to fix this problem?

item.title: 602 help (client says exception in main error)
item.dc:creator: @stevenlin598 stevenlin598
item.description:
@stevenlin598 wrote:

This is the error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: loader
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(unknown source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: loader. Program will exit

Does anybody know how to fix this problem?

Read full topic
